subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The New York Racing Association revoked the credential of the prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo after state authorities took over his farm.
snippet: The New York Racing Association revoked the credential of the prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo after state authorities took over his farm.
